Charlene Weiß

Postdoc in mathematics at Paderborn University

A complete CV is available on request.

Education

  • PhD in Mathematics (with distinction), Feb 2023
    Paderborn University, Germany

  • Master of Science in Mathematics (with distinction), Sept 2017
    Otto von Guericke University Magdeburg, Germany

  • ERASMUS+ exchange semester, Aug–Dec 2015
    NTNU Trondheim, Norway

  • Bachelor of Science in Mathematics (with distinction), Sept 2014
    Otto von Guericke University Magdeburg, Germany

Service

Since February 2023 I have been the equal opportunities officer of the Faculty of Electronic Engineering, Compute Science and Mathematics at Paderborn University.

From 10/2020 til 09/2022, I organized the Lernzentrum Mathematik together with Lara Gildehaus, which is a learning center that employs student assistants and offers support to mathematics students and preservice higher secondary teachers of mathematics.

From 03/2018 til 09/2020, I was part of the team for public relations at the Department of Mathematics, which organizes an open house to advertise mathematics and gives talks to high school students interested in studying mathematics. Moreover, I have been a mentor in the program perspEktIve M, which addresses female students at our faculty who are interested in research and doctoral studies.

I also was a member in hiring committees for professors and in the student-assitants-committee of the Department of Mathematics.
